titleStmt.title: To the right honourable my Lords, of his Majesty's Commission Ecclesiastical
titleStmt.author: Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.

notesStmt.note: Rochester = Thomas Sprat, Lord Bishop of Rochester.
Place and date of publication from National Library of Scotland.
Wing (2nd ed.) incorrectly gives publication date as 1698.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
